comments.body: there's an open question as to what the best thing to do is here.  Because 'declare' isn't valid as a modifier, we probably shouldn't set hte 'ambient' flag on the constructor.  But don't worry about that right now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@!!! error TS1031: 'declare' modifier cannot appear on a class element.
                            ~
!!! error TS1184: An implementation cannot be declared in ambient contexts.
    }
